exclusion.criterion: Unwillingness to give informed consent and to enter a regular follow-up program.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Prior surgical or percutaneous mitral valve intervention
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Clinical signs of cardiogenic shock at the time of randomization
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function and EF was 25%. He underwent preop workup for valvular replacement.
